traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The erina has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Hardy
traits.desc: The erina has advantage on saving throws against poison.

traits.name: Spines
traits.desc: An enemy who hits the erina with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
